snippet.title: EMBERDRIFT Trailer
snippet.description:
Emberdrift is a fast-paced roguelike platformer inspired by Sonic The Hedgehog, Celeste, Overwatch, and Dead Cells! Run, dash, grind, and blast your way through uniquely generated worlds using abilities and weapons that change every run.  Develop amazing synergies that give you a fighting chance against the insane bosses you'll encounter along the way.  Collect mutalith to get permanent upgrades and push every run further.

Wishlist on Steam here! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2876860/Emberdrift/

Planned release date: 2024
